text: læa xok lum chn khxng chan xey phwk than cng kratha tam næwthang khxng phwk than chan k ca kratha (tam næwthang khxng chan) læw phwk than k ca ru wa phu dı thi kar lngthosʹ ca prasb kæ khea ca thahı khea xdsu læa phu dı thi khea pen khn kohk læa phwk than cng khxy fea dutheid thæcring chan k rwm kab phwk than khxy fea du xyu dwy
